EmailTemplate.description: Follow-up email for ColoradoBiz WiW offer
EmailTemplate.name: Post: WiW follow-up
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to my voicemail
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Just following up on my call to you just now! I look forward to speaking with you about the special section we are running in ColoradoBiz magazine highlighting outstanding, award-winning women wealth managers in Denver.
Check out more information on this exclusive opportunity, then click here to schedule a meeting with me to go over this exclusive opportunity.
If you have any questions, please contact me at any time.
Thank you,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!Contact.OwnerPhone} {!Contact.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
